name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Scribes of Fate
summary: The Elder Scrolls Online: Scribes of Fate is a DLC for The Elder Scrolls Online. It is the 29th DLC released for the game and continues the year-long Shadow Over Morrowind adventure along with Update 37. Its release date is March 13th, 2023 for PC and Mac, and March 28th, 2023 for Xbox and PlayStation.
